# MTLDataType.long

**Case**

A 64-bit, signed integer value.

## Declaration

```swift
case long
```

## 64-bit integer types

- **MTLDataType.long2**: A two-component vector with 64-bit, signed integer values.
- **MTLDataType.long3**: A three-component vector with 64-bit, signed integer values.
- **MTLDataType.long4**: A four-component vector with 64-bit, signed integer values.
- **MTLDataType.ulong**: A 64-bit, unsigned integer value.
- **MTLDataType.ulong2**: A two-component vector with 64-bit, unsigned integer values.
- **MTLDataType.ulong3**: A three-component vector with 64-bit, unsigned integer values.
- **MTLDataType.ulong4**: A four-component vector with 64-bit, unsigned integer values.
